TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SequentialActivityDesigner extends System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.StructuredCompositeActivityDesigner

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 為所有在工作流程設計介面上擁有循序垂直版面配置的活動設計工具定義屬性和方法。

span.span: Defines properties and methods for all activity designers that have a sequential vertical layout on the workflow design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 和自其繼承的類別可以包含子活動設計工具。The and classes that inherit from it can contain child activity designers. 它們在工作流程設計介面上的外觀是垂直式，子活動則顯示在 介面上。Their appearance on the workflow design surface is organized vertically, with child activities displayed on the surface of the .

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 傳回 `true`，設計工具便會在工作流程設計介面上呈現一個展開摺疊按鈕。If returns `true`, the designer renders an expand-collapse button on the workflow design surface. 如果 的父設計工具為 ，則 `false` 傳回 。If the parent designer of the is , returns `false`. 此外，如果 為根目錄設計工具，則 傳回 `false`。Additionally, if the is the root designer, returns `false`.

summary.span: 傳回矩型陣列，這個陣列會連接 (繫結) 活動設計工具接點的連接位置。

span.span: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.

returns.span: 連接 (繫結) 接點的 陣列。

span.span: The array that bounds the connectors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目前的設計工具不是使用中設計工具，或者設計工具沒有展開，則 會傳回空的陣列。If the current designer is not the active designer or if the designer is not expanded, returns an empty array. 如果父設計工具中沒有活動設計工具，則 會傳回方框陣列。If there are no activity designers in the parent designer, returns an array of one rectangle.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo HitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed

param.name: point
param.span: 要從中收集資訊的工作流程設計介面 位置。

span.span: The location on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.

summary.span: 傳回位於工作流程設計介面指定點的 相關資訊。

span.span: Returns information about the at the specified point on the workflow design surface.
A that contains information about the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的資訊是以傳入之工作流程設計介面上的點為基準。The information returned by is based on the point on the workflow design surface that was passed to it. 其中包含與此點關聯的活動設計工具、該活動設計工具的界限、點的確切點擊位置、與此點關聯的所有可選取物件，以及與此點關聯的所有使用者資料。It includes the activity designer associated with the point, the bounds of that activity designer, the exact hit location of the point, any selectable objects associated with the point, and any user data associated with the point.
